title:
H\"older continuity of the integrated density of states for Liouville
  frequencies
abstract:
We prove H\"older continuity of the Lyapunov exponent $L(\omega,E)$ and the
integrated density of states at energies that satisfy
$L(\omega,E)>4\kappa(\omega,E)\cdot \beta(\omega)\geq 0$ for general analytic
potentials, with $\kappa(\omega,E)$ being Avila's acceleration.
